remarks: Value of the projection map with implicit domain.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
pjfval2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
pjfval2.p $e |- P = ( proj1 ` W ) $.
pjfval2.k $e |- K = ( proj ` W ) $.
pjfval2 $p |- K = ( x e. dom K |-> ( x P ( ._|_ ` x ) ) ) $.
$d ._|_ x $.
$d K x $.
$d P x $.
$d W x $.
